snippet: AITKEN--Eleanor A.,on March 15, 2016. Beloved sister of the late Margaret Blahnik and George Aitken. Loving aunt of George Aitken and Ruth Eide. Devoted foster sister of Susan Caccappolo. Retired Assistant Director of Nursing of Lenox Hill Hospital. Reposing at Schuyler Hill Funeral Home, 3535 E. Tremont Avenue, Bronx, NY 10465 on Thursday 2-5pm and 7-9pm. Funeral Service at the funeral home Friday 10am. Interment Mt. Hope Cemetery, Hastings-on-Hudson. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made in Eleanor's name to VNS Hospice at: www.vnsny.org/hospice. 1/3
